NomaiObject: solely 1 PLUME: Dear Phlox, when you wake from your rest, I will have left your company momentarily. I am joining our friends to conduct important research with our friends on the tentacled lifeforms, while weather on the planet is calm. 2 1 PLUME: I am aware the roots growing into the ceiling of our chamber frighten you at times. I have left the lights powered inside the tower, in hopes that it soothes your fears when you wake. 3 2 PLUME: You may go to Coleus' chamber to paint with one of his canvases, should a thunderstorm keep you from rest. I promise we will return soon to keep you company shortly! Be well, my beloved son. 4 3 PHLOX: Papa, I tried to paint, but the roots followed me into Coleus' chamber too! But, there are no trees in the chamber below! It's really scaring me... 5 4 MELORAE: Try to capture a photo of these strange roots the next time you see it and try to locate its source, Phlox! I suspect the Garden Chamber's tree must have taken on a state of quantum superposition... LC EX3 2 LC_G R2 4 LC_G R3 5
